label: Blur
tooltip: Amount of blur to apply to elements.

label: Border Thickness
tooltip: Thickness of borders for elements.

label: Border Radius
tooltip: Rounded corners for card elements.

label: Button Border Radius
tooltip: Rounded corners for buttons.

label: Blur
tooltip: Amount of blur to apply to the background image.

label: Brightness
tooltip: Brightness level of the background image.

label: Contrast
tooltip: Contrast level of the background image.

label: Saturation
tooltip: Saturation level of the background image.

label: Blur
tooltip: Amount of blur to apply to the animated background.

label: Saturation
tooltip: Saturation level of the animated background.

label: Contrast
tooltip: Contrast level of the animated background.

label: Brightness
tooltip: Brightness level of the animated background.

label: Animation Time
tooltip: Time it takes for the animated background to complete one cycle. (30s-60s prefered, 0 = no animation)

label: Opacity
tooltip: Opacity of the whole backdrop.

label: Background Color Opacity
tooltip: Background Color Opacity of the now playing bar.

label: Height
tooltip: Height of the now playing bar.

label: Padding
tooltip: Space between the content and the edges of the now playing bar.

label: Border Radius
tooltip: Rounded corners for the now playing bar.

label: Blur
tooltip: Amount of blur to apply to the now playing bar.

label: Saturation
tooltip: Saturation level of the now playing bar.

label: Contrast
tooltip: Contrast level of the now playing bar.

label: Brightness
tooltip: Brightness level of the now playing bar.

label: Opacity
tooltip: Opacity of the background for beautiful lyrics.

label: Saturation
tooltip: Saturation level of the background for beautiful lyrics.

label: Contrast
tooltip: Contrast level of the background for beautiful lyrics.

label: Brightness
tooltip: Brightness level of the background for beautiful lyrics.
